title: Where she belongs...
creator_credit: Nikki Butler, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Nikki Butler pays tribute to her Nana, a strong, knowledgeable Aboriginal women. Despite being a part of the Stolen Generation and growing up away from her land, Nana has taught Butler so much about her heritage, culture and land. Butler hopes to be with her when Nana does finally return home.
creator_credit_for_label: Nikki Butler, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
